author: Ryan Daws
description:
During the Microsoft Build conference, GitHub announced they’re giving Copilot agent capabilities to automate DevOps loops.  When needed, Copilot will be able to essentially take the wheel – that’s the gist of their new asynchronous coding agent, now embedded directly within GitHub and chattable from VS Code. It’s all about creating what they’re calling a... Read more »

The post GitHub Copilot automates DevOps loops with agent capabilities appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: GitHub Copilot automates DevOps loops with agent capabilities
